title: Continue vs Code Llama: Which code ai Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Continue vs Code Llama. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best code ai tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Continue and Code Llama for your code ai needs? Both are popular tools in the AI space, but they have different strengths, pricing models, and use cases. This comprehensive comparison breaks down the key differences to help you make an informed decision.

sections.title: Overview: Continue vs Code Llama
paragraphs: Continue is Continue is an open-source AI code assistant that brings the power of ChatGPT, Claude, and other LLMs directly into VS Code and JetBrains IDEs. It offers inline code generation, codebase-aware chat, and the ability to use any LLM provider or self-hosted model. Its key differentiator is complete customization - you control which model to use, what context to send, and how the AI interacts with your code, all while keeping your setup portable and vendor-neutral.. It's known for open-source, code-assistant, llm.

Code Llama, on the other hand, is Code Llama is a family of large language models (LLMs) specifically fine-tuned from Meta's LLaMA 2 for programming and code-related tasks. It excels at generating, explaining, debugging, and completing code across a wide range of popular languages like Python, C++, Java, and JavaScript. It is uniquely positioned as a state-of-the-art, open-source alternative to proprietary code models, offering specialized variants for infilling and long-context support.. Users choose it for llm, code-generation, programming-assistant.

sections.title: Pricing Comparison
paragraphs: When it comes to value for money, consider your specific use case and team size. Continue offers a free tier, making it great for getting started.

sections.title: Features & Capabilities
paragraphs: Continue excels in: Support for multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, local models), Inline code generation and refactoring suggestions, Codebase-aware chat with context from your project. This makes it ideal for teams that need open-source.

Code Llama stands out with: Code generation from natural language prompts, Code infilling within existing code context, Support for over 20 programming languages (Python, C++, Java, Bash, etc.). It's particularly strong for users focused on llm.

sections.title: Use Cases: When to Choose Each Tool
paragraphs: Choose Continue if: You need open-source, work with code-assistant, or require flexible pricing.
Choose Code Llama if: You prioritize llm, work in code-generation, or prefer their pricing model.

sections.title: Pros & Cons
paragraphs: Continue Pros: Verified platform, Highly rated (4.6/5), Extensive feature set.
Continue Cons: Some limitations on free tier.
Code Llama Pros: Verified platform, Highly rated (4.5/5), Comprehensive features.
Code Llama Cons: May have feature limitations.

verdict: Both Continue and Code Llama are solid choices for code ai. Your choice depends on your specific requirements: Continue is better for open-source, while Code Llama excels at llm. Consider trying both with their free tiers or trials to see which fits your workflow better.
